marklogic.body: Right on Dr. Marie! Nice explanation! I managed a vet clinic for 15 years and got so Burnt out by this dilemma! I worried over the staff not being paid enough, I worried over the animals suffering because their people couldn't pay for needed care. It was terribly stressful. My daughter recently graduated from vet school and is a practicing vet who works long hours and has incredibly high student loans to pay Off. I understand that this is a calling. I was called to work in this field and loved it. My daughter loves it as well, but it is a tough way to make a living.
